mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_animal ( animal_code, os_code_animal, bl_code, m_shelter_id, os_code_kind, animal_breed, animal_area, animal_id_code, animal_weight, animal_age, animal_enroll_date) VALUES ( #{animalCode}, #{osCodeAnimal}, #{blCode}, #{mShelterId}, #{osCodeKind}, #{animalBreed}, #{animalArea}, #{animalIdCode}, #{animalWeight}, #{animalAge}, now() );
mapper.select: select max(CAST(substring(animal_code,13) AS DECIMAL)) as maxcol from t_animal

SELECT os.os_name ,osk.os_name as osNameAnimalKind , animal_breed , animal_area , animal_id_code , animal_weight , animal_age , bl.bl_shelter_Name , animal_enroll_date , animal_code FROM t_animal a INNER JOIN t_overall_status os ON os.os_code = a.os_code_animal INNER JOIN t_overall_status osk ON osk.os_code = a.os_code_kind INNER JOIN t_business_license bl ON a.bl_code = bl.bl_code

SELECT animal_code as animalCode ,animal_breed as animalBreed , animal_area as animalArea , animal_id_code as animalIdCode , animal_weight as animalWeight , animal_age as animalAge From t_animal WHERE animal_code=#{animalCode};

SELECT osk.os_name as osNameAnimalKind , animal_breed , animal_area , animal_id_code , animal_weight , animal_age , bl.bl_shelter_Name , animal_enroll_date , animal_code FROM t_animal a INNER JOIN t_overall_status osk ON osk.os_code = a.os_code_kind INNER JOIN t_business_license bl ON a.bl_code = bl.bl_code WHERE animal_code =#{animalCode};
